âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Supports VMess, VLESS, Trojan, Shadowsocks, Hysteria2 protocols â€¢ Parses proxies from text, Base64 strings, and subscription links â€¢ Multithreaded checking with up to 1337 threads â€¢ Batch mode for reduced CPU load and faster checking â€¢ Automatic sorting of working proxies by ping or speed
ðŸ“– Summary: MK_XRAYchecker is a powerful, multithreaded Python utility designed for mass checking the availability and latency of V2Ray/Xray proxies. It supports various protocols and can parse proxy configurations from multiple sources, automatically sorting working proxies by ping and speed.
